SEARCH
Package com.example.sprite.Controllers

Class QRCodeService

java.lang.Object
com.example.sprite.Controllers.QRCodeService
public class QRCodeService extends Object
Service class that handles QR code generation, encoding, and decoding operations.

This service provides functionality to:

  • Generate QR codes for events
  • Encode event data into QR code format
  • Decode QR codes to retrieve event information
  • Update QR code data in Firebase for events

The service uses the ZXing library for QR code operations and integrates with DatabaseService to persist QR code information.

  • Method Details

    • encodeQRCode

      public android.graphics.Bitmap encodeQRCode(Event event)
      Encodes an event into a QR code bitmap image.

      This method generates a QR code containing event information. Currently returns null as the implementation is incomplete.

      Parameters:
      event - The event to encode into a QR code
      Returns:
      A bitmap image of the QR code, or null if not implemented

    • decodeQRCode

      public void decodeQRCode(com.google.zxing.BinaryBitmap image) throws com.google.zxing.ChecksumException, com.google.zxing.NotFoundException, com.google.zxing.FormatException
      Decodes a QR code image to extract event information.

      This method reads a QR code from a binary bitmap and extracts the encoded data. Currently the result is not returned.

      Parameters:
      image - The QR code image as a BinaryBitmap
      Throws:
      com.google.zxing.ChecksumException - If the QR code checksum is invalid
      com.google.zxing.NotFoundException - If no QR code is found in the image
      com.google.zxing.FormatException - If the QR code format is invalid
